thread.section_title: Airtasker Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Airtasker | www.airtasker.com
thread.title: Paul Simonis

author: Paul Simonis
title: Paul Simonis
text: This website offers a remarkably efficient service. I posted the task that I wanted done, and literally within minutes the offers started coming in. The offers were from a range of people with varying trades experience, each offering a Quote: for the job I had posted. All I had to do was choose the person I thought most suitable. Then, within minutes I was put in contact with that person and everything was sorted. Excellent!
